transportAdvice: Hanoi has a growing metro system with limited coverage, supplemented by an extensive public bus network that reaches most tourist areas; taxis and motorbike taxis are widely available and affordable. The Old Quarter is compact and walkable, though heavy traffic and chaotic streets can make longer journeys more comfortable by vehicle.

weather.description: Cool and dry with occasional drizzle and overcast skies; pack a light jacket for evenings.
Still cool with persistent light mist and drizzle common; comfortable for sightseeing but bring layers.
Warming up with increasing humidity and occasional light rain; expect hazy, muggy conditions.
Noticeably warmer and more humid with occasional showers as the wet season approaches.
Hot and humid with frequent afternoon thunderstorms; the rainy season is underway.
Peak heat and heavy rainfall; expect intense downpours and steamy conditions throughout the day.
One of the wettest months with high temperatures and frequent heavy rain; flooding can occur.
Continued heavy rainfall and heat; typhoon-related weather can occasionally affect the region.
Still rainy and warm as the wet season begins to taper; expect regular afternoon showers.
Rainfall decreasing and temperatures becoming more pleasant; a good transitional month for travel.
Cooler and drier conditions return; comfortable temperatures make this an excellent time to visit.
Cool and mostly dry with crisp air; light layers are recommended especially in the mornings and evenings.
